ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie Carva is Vampblade, but now when she transforms, the blades are the ones in control… and the blades are really f$%#@d up! Consequently, so is Katie’s life!!
Features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant as well!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Celor | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Celor | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Pow Rodrix | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Pow Rodrix | 6 | Note: The digital edition (4/19/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
